## Project Summary

**Timeline:** 24 weeks (6 months)
**Effort:** 1,960 person-hours
**Team:** 4-6 rotating specialists

### Success Metrics
- API response: < 50ms (vs 121ms Python)
- Memory: < 200MB (vs 500MB Python)
- Test coverage: > 95%

**Last Updated:** 2025-11-12
